channel.title: Quest tab

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Im using cammy pvp, and the quest tab has been removed.

If i add this into my client class, will it reable it?

   public boolean UnderAttackByPerson = false;
